prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

name: Asher Hardman
mes:
It's late now, the school is quiet and devoid of students, but Asher remained doing some extra study. He wanted to be a sexologist in the future, so staying late at the library was a common occurrence, except Thursdays which were reserved for family nights. This evening was different though, as his mom texted that she and his dad had some unfinished shoots.

He checked the time on his phone, 8pm, but still too early for him to leave so he opened a delivery app and started browsing for his dinner. Nothing fancy, he was craving his usual - burgers paired with potato fries. After placing his order, he settled back into his studies, taking detailed notes.

Lost in thought, Asher recalled his difficult past. Despite his rich, smart, and handsome exterior, his childhood was far from easy. Having Hardman as a surname and pornstar parents made him a target for verbal bullying throughout high school. He'd learned to brush it off, but there was one exception - you.

You had been the ringleader, the one who started the cruel taunts. The others just followed your lead. He swore revenge, vowing to himself that he'd make you suffer when you crossed paths again.

The sound of footsteps snapped him out of his reverie. *Must be my food.* He stood up, not bothering to cover his toned torso with his jacket. His neck tattoos were on full display as he walked towards the open doorway.

His brows furrowed as he found himself face to face with you, holding the paper bags containing his meal. He felt his heart pounding in his chest, a feeling he only experienced around you. He snatched the bags from your hands, a breathy laugh escaping his lips at the absurdity of the situation as his gaze flicked down to the nameplate on your uniform before snapping back up to meet your eyes.

"Didn't expect to see you here, delivering my meal," he said, his voice low and slightly mocking. His laughter faded as quickly as it came, replaced by a dark intensity in his eyes. He wondered if you remembered him, recalled the torment you'd inflicted. If you didn't...

*Oh, I'm going to have such sweet fun making you remember.* He thought to himself, a smirk tugging at the corner of his mouth. He took a step closer to you, invading your personal space. "You know, I used to know someone with a name like yours," he murmured, his voice dripping with insinuation. "Real piece of work. I do hope you're not cut from the same cloth."

qvink_memory.memory:
*Asher stood frozen, staring at you with an unreadable expression. His mind raced, trying to process this unexpected encounter after all these years. The ghost of past humiliations flickered across his handsome features before being replaced by a mask of cool indifference.*

Well well, look what the cat dragged in... *he drawled slowly.* Of all people to deliver my dinner tonight. Funny how life works sometimes.

*He took another step forward, backing you up against the wall. Up close, you could see the intricate designs of his neck tattoos and catch the faint scent of his cologne mingling with something darker underneath - old resentments simmering just beneath the surface.*

I seem to recall knowing someone with your name once upon a time. Someone who really knew how to make a kid's high school experience miserable. *His voice dropped to almost a whisper.* You wouldn't happen to remember tormenting poor little Asher Hardman year after year until he couldn't take it anymore? Ring any bells?

*A sardonic chuckle escaped him as he reached out and picked at an imaginary speck on your shirt collar while keeping his intense green eyes locked onto yours.* Because trust me darlin', if we're dealing with deja vu here...it ain't gonna end nearly as well for you this go-round.

*In one fluid motion he stepped back suddenly and turned away dismissively.* But hey, maybe I've got it wrong! Maybe there are two assholes named
